description: OPINION AND ORDER for  88   Report and Recommendation. For the reasons above, the Report is adopted in full. Defendants' motions for summary judgment are GRANTED in part and DENIED in part. Defendants' motions for summary judgment to dismis s all claims are denied. Defendants' motions for partial summary judgment on the issue of limitation of liability are as follows: granted to Danmar as its  liability is limited to $500 per package, (2) granted to the Vessel as its  liabilit y is limited to 100 per package and (3) denied to Air Express as its  liability is limited to 8.33 Special Drawing Rights per kilo. The Clerk of Court is respectfully directed to close the motions at Dkt. Nos. 56  and 61.    (Signed by Judge Lorna G. Schofield on 9/30/2024)   (mml)
